results.description: if_else(greater(quantile(implied_volatility_call_20), 0.95), subtract(ts_mean(implied_volatility_call_20,5), implied_volatility_call_20), NaN). Single field and simple logic to meet KEEP_IN_MIND. Confidence: 0.6

results.idea: Long-tenor IV momentum normalized by mean IV
results.description: divide(ts_delta(implied_volatility_call_360,10), implied_volatility_mean_360) per SUGGESTION1. No vector/backfill. Two fields used. Confidence: 0.62

results.idea: Parkinson vs historical cross-section zscore: detect anomalous intraday ranges
results.description: zscore(divide(parkinson_volatility_60, historical_volatility_60)) applied per SUGGESTION1. Two fields used, ops minimal. Confidence: 0.63

results.idea: IV mean-skew cross-over: short mean_skew crossing long mean_skew
results.description: subtract(implied_volatility_mean_skew_20, implied_volatility_mean_skew_90) per SUGGESTION1. No vector/backfill. Two fields. Confidence: 0.58

results.idea: Relative realized volatility rank over 120 days for stock selection
results.description: ts_rank(historical_volatility_120, 120) used per SUGGESTION1 to rank long-term realized vol (SUGGESTION2/3 not applicable). Single-field, simple implementation. Confidence: 0.65

results.idea: IV decline momentum: sustained negative ts_sum indicates cooling of option demand
results.description: ts_sum(ts_delta(implied_volatility_put_60, 1), 20) per SUGGESTION1. No vector/backfill. Single-field. Confidence: 0.59

results.idea: Call IV scaled by parkinson vol to detect intraday demand
results.description: divide(implied_volatility_call_30, parkinson_volatility_30) per SUGGESTION1 to scale IV by intraday range. Two fields used. Confidence: 0.66

results.idea: IV spread momentum across tenors using ts_delta of difference
results.description: ts_delta(subtract(implied_volatility_call_120, implied_volatility_call_30), 5) per SUGGESTION1 to capture slope changes. Two fields used. Confidence: 0.67

results.idea: Put-call imbalance zscore weighted by long mean
results.description: zscore(divide(subtract(implied_volatility_put_120, implied_volatility_call_120), implied_volatility_mean_120)) used per SUGGESTION1. Three fields could be used but constrained to two by scaling with mean of call_120. Confidence: 0.65

results.idea: IV reversal after rapid compression measured via ts_max_diff negative on IV
results.description: ts_max_diff(implied_volatility_call_30, 10) negative values indicate compression; used alone per SUGGESTION1. No vector/backfill. Simple. Confidence: 0.6
